Title: Cutting the Swarm
Description:
The mantid numbers have been increasing since you left for the cleft. Let's put these orbs you gathered to use.

Get down on the battlefront and man one of the cannons. Let none through.
ObjectivesText: Use a Dragon Launcher to kill 50 swarming mantid.
CompletionText: I can't remember the last time they swarmed this thickly. They probably haven't within my lifetime.
